title: Chandra Gets into Driver’s Seat for TCS AI Ride
description: Tata Sons chairman N Chandrasekaran is stepping up direct involvement with Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) as a priority to steer Indias largest IT company through a vulnerable phase and ring-fence the groups largest cash generator at a time when artificial intelligence (AI) threatens established business models, said people with knowledge of the matter.
